name: nessotron
text: Yes! Yes! I love how he puts his hand on his heart. That is so good. So, so good.

name: arcellus
text: maybe it's pants_come_off

name: jdhenry105
text: A comment left by jdhenry105 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, cmjhogan, miaou)

name: ambala
text: Everything makes so much more sense now!

name: ghostd
text: Ah, wistful Teodor. So very wistful.

name: frances_bavier
text: another one i think about regularly!

name: a_dude
text: i can relate.

name: nessotron
text: I also love how Lyle has no idea what is going through Teoder's mind. He's just sitting there, blankly.

name: sparhawk
text: The boy don't even have a cheek yet, he don't have no faculties for expression.

name: epicurus
text: These are okay, but I really can't wait for the "good" achewoods to start appearing. I can only enjoy these for nostalgia's sake for so long, you know?

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: The concept of thinking about someone in your private moments has become a go to joke, so much so I'd forgotten it originated from Achewood.  Who knows what else I only know because of Onstad.

name: rowboat
text: Uh, I have to imagine that the concept originated a little earlier - maybe when monkeys began walking on two legs - but yes, it is nice.

name: spectre
text: "I think about her in my private moments" -- yeah, I was nonstarter with the ladies once.

name: lawdog
text: Is anyone else alarmed at how much Teodor's shoes look like ears? Assuming those are his shoes, of course.  Otherwise, we're looking at a VERY different strip here.

name: philosophe
text: Especially in panels 1 and 4 where he's looking down.

name: catgrl131
text:
Actually, they do kinda look like cat ears.
Well, I guess Ray had to pay him back sometime.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Except that Ray has round ears. And the two have most likely not met, yet.

(I am sorry that I have the compulsion to point these things out, Catgrl. I still think you are rad.)

name: especial
text:
What they look like are Felix the Cat's ears.
[IMGS OFF]

name: i_love_kate
text:
Felix the Cat in

Stag Night!

In which Felix gets the clap from a toilet-stall rim job before waking up ten feet inside the Antactic circle.

name: i_love_kate
text:
I hate comments that I don't remember making.

Also, *antarctic.

name: evolume
text: She looks just like a model from the FAO Schwarz catalogue.

name: aristagoras
text: Onstad really knew how to turn a phrase back then.

name: em2
text: Have you heard about the lonesome loser?

name: coralie
text: I have been the subject of that sentence before. Yay for entering vernacular, boo for creeping me out.

name: greenkoolayd
text: ugh.  internet love is stupid.

name: ratacattt
text: TEST
